tap.backup

Class DefaultTAPBackupManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • uws.service.backup.DefaultUWSBackupManager
      • tap.backup.DefaultTAPBackupManager
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    UWSBackupManager

    public class DefaultTAPBackupManager
extends DefaultUWSBackupManager

    Let backup all TAP asynchronous jobs.

    note: Basically the saved data are the same, but in addition some execution statistics are also added.

    Version:
    2.0 (12/2014)
    Author:
    Grégory Mantelet (CDS;ARI)
    See Also:
    DefaultUWSBackupManager

      • DefaultTAPBackupManager

        public DefaultTAPBackupManager(UWS uws,
                       long frequency)
        Build a default TAP jobs backup manager.
        Parameters:
        uws - The UWS containing all the jobs to backup.
        frequency - The backup frequency (in ms ; MUST BE positive and different from 0. If negative or 0, the frequency will be automatically set to DEFAULT_FREQUENCY).
        See Also:
        DefaultUWSBackupManager.DefaultUWSBackupManager(UWS, long)

    • Method Detail

      • getJSONJob

        protected JSONObject getJSONJob(UWSJob job,
                    java.lang.String jlName)
                         throws UWSException,
                                JSONException
        Description copied from class: DefaultUWSBackupManager

        Serializes the given job into a JSON object.

        note: the structure of the returned JSON object is decided by Json4Uws.getJson(UWSJob). Only one attribute is added: "jobListName".

        Overrides:
        getJSONJob in class DefaultUWSBackupManager
        Parameters:
        job - The job to save.
        jlName - Name of the jobs list containing the given job.
        Returns:
        The JSON representation of the given job.
        Throws:
        UWSException - If there is an error while getting job parameters and serializing them.
        JSONException - If there is an error while building the JSON object.

      • getDALIUploadJson

        protected JSONObject getDALIUploadJson(DALIUpload upl)
                                throws JSONException
        Get the JSON representation of the given DALIUpload.
        Parameters:
        upl - The DALI upload specification to serialize in JSON.
        Returns:
        Its JSON representation.
        Throws:
        JSONException - If there is an error while building the JSON object.
        Since:
        2.0

      • restoreOtherJobParams

        protected void restoreOtherJobParams(JSONObject json,
                         UWSJob job)
                              throws UWSException
        Description copied from class: DefaultUWSBackupManager

        Restores other job parameters, either from the given JSON object or from the parameters map of the given job. The job is supposed to be updated after the call of this function.

        note: By default, this function does nothing ! It is called by DefaultUWSBackupManager.restoreJob(JSONObject, Map) just after the default restoration from the given JSON and just before to add the job in its dedicated jobs list.

        Overrides:
        restoreOtherJobParams in class DefaultUWSBackupManager
        Parameters:
        json - JSON backup of the given job.
        job - Default restoration of the job.
        Throws:
        UWSException - If there is an error while restoring other job parameters.
        See Also:
        DefaultUWSBackupManager.restoreJob(JSONObject, Map)
